fraudulent_transaction.reasoning: High-risk transaction detected: New user account (8 days), first transaction with high amount ($7,500), unusual merchant with low rating and multiple fraud reports, suspicious location change from USA to Nigeria, transaction at odd hours (3:45 AM).

PatternDetector.name: PatternDetector
findings: First transaction on new account (high risk)
Unusually high transaction amount for new user
Transaction pattern matches known fraud signatures
PatternDetector.reasoning: New account with high-value first transaction raises red flags

BehavioralAnalyzer.name: BehavioralAnalyzer
findings: User age only 8 days (very new account)
No transaction history to establish normal behavior
Sudden high-value transaction anomaly
BehavioralAnalyzer.reasoning: Behavioral patterns indicate likely fraudulent activity

VelocityChecker.name: VelocityChecker
findings: First transaction with no velocity data
Amount significantly higher than typical first transactions

MerchantRiskAnalyzer.name: MerchantRiskAnalyzer
findings: Merchant rating very low (2.1/5.0)
23 fraud reports associated with this merchant
Merchant in high-risk category (cryptocurrency exchange)
MerchantRiskAnalyzer.reasoning: Merchant has extremely high fraud risk profile

GeographicAnalyzer.name: GeographicAnalyzer
findings: Drastic location change: California, USA â†’ Lagos, Nigeria
Transaction in high-risk geographic region
Transaction time suspicious for location (3:45 AM)
GeographicAnalyzer.reasoning: Geographic anomalies suggest potential account takeover

legitimate_transaction.reasoning: Low-risk transaction: Established user account (1250 days), consistent transaction history (456 transactions), moderate amount ($180), reputable merchant with high rating and no fraud reports, consistent location usage.

PatternDetector.name: PatternDetector
findings: Consistent transaction pattern with user history
Amount within normal range for this user
No suspicious patterns detected
PatternDetector.reasoning: Transaction aligns with established user patterns

findings: User account well-established (1250 days)
Strong transaction history (456 transactions)
Behavior consistent with normal usage
BehavioralAnalyzer.reasoning: Behavioral patterns indicate legitimate user activity

findings: Transaction velocity within normal parameters
Amount consistent with historical average

MerchantRiskAnalyzer.reasoning: Merchant has excellent reputation and safety profile
